msbt.message: It's really quiet in hereeven quieter than my bedroom EyelidsclosinggettingsleepyWhoa! I almost fell asleep just then. But then my tummy rumbled and woke me up. I'm a huh huh hungry!
Everything in here is just so quiet and stillso if I stand reeeeally still I can just blend in!Look ma, I'm art! A huh huh huh!
You don't think this room is haunted, do you? Because it'd be SO creepy if it was haunted.Like, imagine you're in here alone at night, and you hear a whisper AAAUGH! I'm scaring myself!
Isn't 's museum so cool? I know the boss put a lot of work into this room especially!
Isn't our museum so big and cool now? <10_4 />Don't tell anyone that I get lost in here for days sometimes
Just walking around in here makes you smarter, you know. How do you think I got so smart?
Isn't this new space so clean and new, ?And it's huuuuge! There's so much room for art, like giant statues and mega fingerpaint installations!
I still can't believe how cool this new display room is. We can come look at fancy art stuff here for FREE?!And then when I think about how this place was just a deserted island before Like, WHOA!
I'm here to check out the new museum display room, just like you.And WOW! It's way more fancy than I was expecting! I hope I'm not messing it up just by being here
